bug.author: gonzalolc
bug.description: Hello I'm trying to implement a custom network with torch but new Digits 4.0 don't display any space to write the model.

comments.comment: Maybe try a hard refresh in your browser (Ctrl+F5)?

You're welcome. Sorry for the inconvenience, but we can't really fix this for this release. <denchmark-link:https://github.com/NVIDIA/DIGITS/pull/904>#904</denchmark-link> should solve the problem going forward.
